name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UniCopy: Save Valuable Notes, Memories, And Docs

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and copy notes, photos, and files across all your devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Save any text, image, link, or file to UniCopy
- Ctrl + Space to open popup, type to add text quickly
- Copy & sync across devices: Get app for other devices at unicopyapp.com
- Add your growing thoughts and ideas
- Edit copied text easily
- Best alternative to OnePlus Clipt
